description: Generate QR Codes and Barcodes entirely server-side, allowing you to process in the backend or just load onto the frontend without another pesky element cluttering up your pages. Additionally, you can use a QR Code With Logo Element (frontend only) with advanced styling, color control, and display options.
name: Barcode & QR Code Generator
plugin_instructions:
Please view the extensive demo here: https://nrb-tester.bubbleapps.io/version-test/server-side-qr-code

Note that you can access all the information you need in the top-left of the demo by clicking the links provided there.
